events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application for covering medical expenses related to recent surgery.
Loan application was reviewed and categorized under personal loans due to its medical expense purpose.
A personal loan officer has been assigned to guide the applicant through the subsequent process and offer assistance.
The initial review of submitted details confirmed the eligibility criteria preliminarily but requires further documentation.
Additional documents requested from the applicant include medical bills, proof of income, and identification scans.
Applicant has provided all requested documents including detailed medical invoices and recent pay stubs.
Credit check was completed and revealed a stable credit history with a good credit score suitable for loan approval.
Risk assessment of the applicant showed low risk due to steady income and a responsible repayment history.
A loan offer detailing repayment terms, interest rates, and schedule was presented to the applicant for review.
Applicant provided feedback on the loan offer, requesting clarification on monthly installment amounts and timelines.
Application was escalated to senior underwriting for final consideration due to applicant's queries and additional review.
The personal loan application has been approved officially following verification of all details and risk analysis.
Approved loan amount was disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for covering the intended medical expenses.
Follow-up call was made to confirm applicant’s satisfaction with fund receipt and to offer ongoing support.
The loan application process is now officially closed after successful funding and follow-up activities.
